revised_title: The Life Cycle and Metamorphosis of the Common Eel (Anguilla vulgaris)
tldr: The author discovers the life cycle and metamorphosis of the common eel (Anguilla vulgaris) through the study of its larval stage, the Leptocephalus brevirostris, and its transformation into the adult form. The research also reveals the migration and reproduction habits of the eel in deep sea environments.
